thread.title: Read Ultratravel's autumn 2015 issue

author: The Telegraph
title: Read Ultratravel's autumn 2015 issue
text: You can read the entire Ultratravel summer 2015 issue as an online ezine This autumn's Ultratravel takes a varied approach, with our writers revealing the best luxury-travel experiences on offer in destinations throughout Africa as part of an air safari unlike all others, and taking things easy in a vibrant New Orleans . Stanley Stewart, meanwhile, rediscovers the allure of Rome while John O'Ceallaigh reports on the latest in luxury travel, including a superyacht being built especially for the world's most extravagant superyachts . Telegraphtravel Follow @telegraphtravel
